com.timmcvicker.todolist

Class ItemsDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.timmcvicker.todolist.ItemsDatabaseHelper

  • public class ItemsDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class is a database helper for the todolist app. It will help to perform CRUD operations on the SQLite database
    Author:
    timmcvicker
    See Also:
    ListItem

      • getInstance

        public static ItemsDatabaseHelper getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - context that the database helper will be used in
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of the database helper

      • onConfigure

        public void onConfigure(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Method that is called when database is configured. Overriden to allow for custom configs
        Overrides:
        onConfigure in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - instance of the SQLite database

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Called when the database is created for the FIRST time, creates desired table. If a database already exists on disk with the same DATABASE_NAME, this method will NOT be called.
        Specified by:
        onCreate in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - instance of SQLite database for this app

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Called when the database needs to be upgraded. This method will only be called if a database already exists on disk with the same DATABASE_NAME, but the DATABASE_VERSION is different than the version of the database that exists on disk.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - instance of SQLite database
        oldVersion - old version of database
        newVersion - new version of database. hard coded as constant at top of class

      • addOrUpdateItem

        public long addOrUpdateItem(ListItem item)
        This method will first attempt to update an item if it is already in the database, keyed off the description. If the description does not exist, it will add a row for the item
        Parameters:
        item - the listItem to update or add
        Returns:
        the id of the updated/inserted listItem

      • getAllItems

        public java.util.List<ListItem> getAllItems()
        This method will return all items currently being stored in the database
        Returns:
        a List containing all listItems currently stored in the database

      • deleteAllItems

        public void deleteAllItems()
        This method deletes all rows currently in the items table

      • deleteItem

        public void deleteItem(ListItem item)
        This method will delete a specific row in the database
        Parameters:
        item - the item in the database to delete, keyed off the description
